title: Established facts about our upcoming champion
body:
* This is the Targonian Aspect of Twilight. Source: Trusted source with friends at Riot. If that's not enough for you, her particles seem to tease it, as they use a circular symbol that's kind of Targon's "logo." Source is Libraeum. EDIT: https://i.imgur.com/XZZzgOE.png
* She's female. Source: Riot
* She's a sparkly burst mage. Source: Riot, champ roadmap
* Her name isn't Daphna. Source: Reav3
* Yes, she puts people to sleep; looks like she creates AoE sleep traps. Source: in-game teaser
* She may also be able to bounce bubbles off walls, judging by all the mentions of angles and reflecting. Source: Champ roadmap
* Expect her to be revealed tomorrow or Tuesday. EDIT: 2 MORE WEEKS

Sorry in advance if I burst anyone's... wait for it.. _bubble_ with this info.

Also, since everyone seems to talk about her being the "aspect of twilight" I wanted to ask, if someone could spare some time to explain to me who or what these aspects are exactly. Not which Champions are aspects, but what role these play in the lore of LoL. I've read the Mt. Targon article, but I didn't understand the parts I wanted to understand.

This will be from memory and probably not well put, but Targon is some kind of celestial civilization that may or may not have started on Runeterra, but maintain some connection with/control over it. They are the ones who enslaved A Sol with the helmet he wears. The Pantheon in particular is shown giving A Sol orders in the dragon's lore.

To continue influencing Runeterra (and possibly other reasons like communicating with A Sol), Targonians can possess people who climb to the top of Mt. Targon if they find them worthy. The Targonians who possess a host have come to be known as the "Aspects". The Aspects seem to have significant differences in how they treat their hosts (a benign, beneficial relationship like Taric and the Protector vs. the Aspect of War (aka Pantheon) totally eliminating Atreus, the original host). 

For some reason there are an unusually high number of Aspects active on Runeterra atm. A Sol's lore hints at dissent among the Targonians, so it's possible that the Aspects are each preparing for some kind of conflict among themselves (or, if they don't care, perhaps ignoring the conflict altogether) and working with their vessels to the extent they see fit to further their own mysterious ends. In at least one case (Leona), the Aspect bestows power and knowledge/awareness of some truth and leaves it to the host to act.

Like I said, some of this is probably inaccurate or speculation, but it's the impression I'm left with after reading A Sol, Leona, Diana, Taric and Pantheon's (RIP Atreus) lore. I am particularly unsure of the nature of Targon itself (Aliens? Ancient Runeterrans who long ago left for space? Purely spiritual celestial beings? Maybe someone else has found that out).
